edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.game.observer

Interface GameStatusObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChessPanel, ControlPanel, GameRecord, PlayerPanel

    public interface GameStatusObserver
    Author:
    shenli

    A class can implement the GameStatusObserver interface when it wants to be informed of game status changes in GameStatusSubject objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateGameModeAndLevel(GameMode mode, ComputerLevel level)
      This method is called whenever the observed object is changed.
      void updateGameStatus(boolean playing, boolean gameOver)
      This method is called whenever the observed object is changed.
      void updateGameTurn(PlayerInfo turn)
      This method is called whenever the observed object is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • updateGameModeAndLevel

        void updateGameModeAndLevel(GameMode mode,
                            ComputerLevel level)
        This method is called whenever the observed object is changed. An application calls a GameStatusSubject object's notifyGameStatusObservers method to have all the object's observers notified of the game status change.

        Parameters:
        mode - a GameMode object passed to the notifyGameStatusObservers method
        level - a ComputerLevel object passed to the notifyGameStatusObservers method

      • updateGameTurn

        void updateGameTurn(PlayerInfo turn)
        This method is called whenever the observed object is changed. An application calls a GameStatusSubject object's notifyGameStatusObservers method to have all the object's observers notified of the game status change.

        Parameters:
        turn - a PlayerInfo object passed to the notifyGameStatusObservers method

      • updateGameStatus

        void updateGameStatus(boolean playing,
                      boolean gameOver)
        This method is called whenever the observed object is changed. An application calls a GameStatusSubject object's notifyGameStatusObservers method to have all the object's observers notified of the game status change.

        Parameters:
        playing - a playing parameter passed to the notifyGameStatusObservers method
        gameOver - a playing parameter passed to the notifyGameStatusObservers method
